domain.game

Class MonopolyTheGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.game.MonopolyTheGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    domain.Observable

    public class MonopolyTheGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements domain.Observable
    This class contains methods to be used in our game such as building, paying moving,rolling dice, updating some domain objects and values of the players and squares
    Author:
    AngryNerds

        indices - locations of the players

        balances - balances that players' have
        assets - assets that players' have
